appversion.change: Bug fixed: Notfication appeared too early
Small bug fixes
Fixed crash on selecting the last date
small bux fixes
Detailed error report when downloading something with an error
Bugfixing
Added data for 2017
Fixed some issues with the ads
Fixed crashes reported from users
Widget is working again
Added developer options
You can in- and export the notes now
Fixed some bugs in the german version
You can choose your color in the settings
The existing widgets can be edited in the APP without removing and adding them to the home screen
If you click on the Daily Word you can choose to open the vers in Quick-Bible or in the browser
Crashes fixed
Now you can open the bible vers in the APP "Quick Bible"
Added verses for year, month and weeks (available in Navigation-Drawer)
added this changelog-dialog
Option for "Date not available": Choose "Change language" in menu and import your language again
new options for language (Change of GUI-language and also Daily-Words language)
Fixed crashes
